caption.center: MAURICE SEGAR v. NANCY C. LOUNSBURY, ADMINISTRATRIX (ESTATE OF C.C.

opinion.opinion_text: It appearing that the defendants in the above-entitled case have failed to prosecute their appeal from the Superior Court in Tolland County with proper diligence, it is, under Practice Book ยง 696, ordered by the Supreme Court of Errors, suo motu, that the appeal be and hereby is dismissed.Page 734
opinion.attorneys: Donald P. Chernoff, for the appellants (defendants).
opinion.opinion_text: The defendants filed a motion for reargument which was granted.
